p: Refined and sauteing oil: In an Erlenmeyer, 56.4 ± 0.2 g was weighed. Afterward, 50 mL of ethanol (≥99.8%) was added, and homogenization was carried out at 60 °C, in atmospheric pressure with stirring. Subsequently, the homogenized solution was titrated with a standardized solution of NaOH 0.1 mol·L−1.
